Target muscles: Iliopsoas. The Rectus Abdominis, a stabilizer, can also be viewed as a target muscle
Synergists: Tensor Fasciae Latae, Sartorius, Pectineus, Adductor Longus, Adductor Brevis, Latissimus Dorsi, Teres Major, Sternal (Lower) Pectoralis Major, Pectoralis Minor, Posterior Deltoid, Rhomboids, Triceps Brachii (long head only)
name: Standing ab wheel rollout
